origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MaintenanceAPI.estimate_cost', 'description': 'This function estimates maintenance costs based on the vehicle model and lease duration.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'vehicleModel', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The model of the vehicle.'}, {'name': 'leaseDuration', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The duration of the lease in months.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'estimatedCost', 'description': 'The estimated maintenance cost over the lease period.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MaintenanceAPI.estimate_cost, 它的参数输入如下: 'vehicleModel'是'Mercedes-Benz S-Class', 'leaseDuration'是'36'.
